description: Frieren, Heiter, and Eisen test the spell that causes the user to say whatever they are thinking on Himmel, who begins to wax-poetic about his looks aloud. The three of them agree that it would be unbearable to listen to it long term.

titles.title: Magic Episode 1: Magic to Say What You Are Thinking
Marumaru no Mahou Dai 1 Kai: Kangaete Iru Koto o Itte Shimau Mahou
●●の魔法 第1回: 考えていることを言ってしまう魔法
